root: ^After enduring your conversation with the CEO, you continue to the next section of the Avanshore. roughly halfway through your flight, Lanri calmly contacts you in a rare sight, showing signs of great restraint from her usual energy explosion.

^"These falling golden obelisks are the reason people are turning into those creatures. It spreads its energy to humans and transforms them into those golden creatures, like the fabled Midas curse turning everything into gold. Midas Creatures…" The unease in Lanri’s always-focused eyes breaking through.

^"If I conduct some experiments on the one we captured I should be able to develop a cure to reverse the effects of the obelisk. However, the constant solar flares have also attracted my attention. As the most advanced entity on the ship, I have a question for you. Which do you think I should research: The Midas Creatures, or Avanshore’s star?"

ExperimentOnMidasCreatures: ^Lanri bobs her head up and down a few times before letting out a sigh of preparation. She heads off to her quarters to gather her needs materials. After a couple hours, she sprints to a contact station to gain your attention. "I think I did it! WOOOOOOOO! Ok sorry. I think I can develop a cure to reverse the effects of those golden obelisks. It will take me a liiiiiiittle bit of time, but i'll get it done!
ExperimentOnSun: ^Lanri bobs her head up and down a few times before letting out a sigh of preparation. She heads off to her quarters to gather her needs materials. After a couple hours, she sprints to a contact station to gain your attention.

^"Ummm boss, we a.. uh.. have a pretty big issue. So that star that's launching solar flares all over the place, It's about to supernova. This whole solar system will be instantly destroyed. Well it would be, hehe, if I didn't already have a solution to contain the supernova. Just give me some time." Lanri flashes an almost devious smirk at you before heading back to her quarters to continue.
